name: zenburn theme for Pocket (getpocket.com)
description: Dark, low contrast scheme based on zenburn theme for vim.
additional_info:
zenburn for pocket (getpocket.com), formerly Read It Later works best with pocket's Dark theme. work in progress, there's a lot of room for improvements ;) --- changelog: 2015-07-06:
  • Added styling for "You have successfully saved this item to Pocket." screen
2015-06-19:
  • Added styling for queue list and excerpt
  • changed "Best of" links to normal gray instead of link green color.
2015-06-18:
  • Initial version
